name: Yamaha MusicCast BAR 400 200W Hi-Res Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer - Black | Dell USA
description: Build a cinema-worthy sound experience in your living room with this Yamaha MusicCast BAR 400 sound bar with wireless subwoofer. Compatibility with 4K UHD televisions ensures you don’t miss a pin drop or footstep. Hear everything you see with this Yamaha MusicCast BAR 400 sound bar and wireless subwoofer. DTS Virtual:X virtual 3-D surround sound syncs with Dolby and DTS-encoded soundtracks to deliver immersive audio that matches the action on the screen and picks up on the slightest whisper. The included subwoofer offers booming bass that brings battlegrounds to life and play-calling to your sofa seating. HDMI, aux and aux ports are compatible with a range of late-model and legacy television sets for effortless setup with your system. A low-profile silhouette lends this Yamaha MusicCast sound bar a minimalist look that blends in with your aesthetic. Place the subwoofer anywhere in the room to enhance your listening experience without running cables. You can add additional MusicCast speakers (not included) for multi-room enjoyment. With wall-mount capability, this sound bar works with VESA-mount televisions for a sleek entertainment hub. Connect to the internet via built-in Wi-Fi or use Bluetooth, AirPlay 2 and Spotify Connect to share your device playlists. Featuring voice control compatibility with Alexa, Google Assistant and Siri, this Yamaha MusicCast sound bar and wireless subwoofer support effortless access without having to get up or find the remote.
